attributes.action: IMPLORE YOU TO FREE MISHA COLLINS (and give him a KBE)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Several days ago (sources are not sure when because he has a flexible, somewhat generalised, interpretation of the truth) the actor, writer and maker of reasonably priced candlesticks - MISHA COLLINS - was removed from Buckingham Palace to Stonehenge for Slight Execution By Death.

The British People (ok, just me) refuse to tolerate this outrage and call on the Prime Minister to save Misha Collins... And consider giving that man a Knighthood (or just the freedom of Parliament, tea and a sticky bun).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
